Articles.Content: 17 kerbals holding the stool in place
Floor 4919: 18 Kerbals doing pre-flight checks.
Floor 4920: A score of Kerbals looking up.

Floor 4921: 21 Kerbals on the space station waiting for the new crew.

Edited May 17 by Kimera Industries
It's a big space station, ok?

Floor 4922: 22 hierophant Kerbals with Tarot cards.

Also 7x7 apprentice Kerbals before them.
Floor 4923: 19 Kerbals, 18 in the command centre and one in the pilots seat, ready to push the button.
Floor 4924: 17 and 1, respectively.
Floor 4925: Liftoff. 20 Kerbals watch a rocket rise on a pillar of flame.
Floor 4926: Pilar Kerman, watching TV about the launch.

Floor 4927: 21 Kerbals. 20 monitoring progress and one in a capsule that has reached orbit. It is heard to sing.

For here am I sitting in a tin can
Far above the world
Planet Kerbin's blue
And there's nothing I can do

Floor 4928: A large space station going by the designation Gene Station, orbiting halfway to geosync orbit. 40 kerbals are monitoring various probes and kerbals across the Kerbolar System, with range going out to Soden.
Floor 4929: 41 Kerbal vikings sitting in a Skuldelev-6 wooden boat for crew of 41.
Floor 4930: Two seasoned Kerbonaut pilots flying T-38 replicas, taking two near recruits for a ride.
Floor 4931: 22 Kerbals slapping their heads as they realise they forgot to add parachutes.
Floor 4932: The entire nuclear arsenal of the world in one Orion Drive. You hurry out of there before it launches.

Floor 4933: 1 exasperated kerbal pulling its hair out its hair over budgeting issues by the kerbals being directed by coldj stating theres no more money for the projects.

083405202024
floor 4893: a haunted piano playing by itself

Floor 4935: a sign reading: correct floor is 4935. Next floor is 4936.

101305202024
Floor 4937: "The next door floor"

Floor 4937 (continuing from proper pattern): A sign with a kerbal facepalming on it with text that reads:

The previous floor was number Four thousand, nine hundred and thirty SIX, not four thousand, nine hundred and thirty seven! (sorry for the inconvinence and ocd)

How troubling.

Edited May 20 by Iapetus7342
minor spelling mistake
Floor 4938: A caption on the wall: "The previous floor was the next door floor, counting from the 4936th".
Floor 4939: 23 Kerbals, 1 in a capsule re-entering the atmosphere, while 22 try to workout how the 1 is going to survive.
Floor 4940: 5x5 Kerbals, self-counting along and across.
Floor 4941: Jeb, wondering why I opted against a heat shield. Cue me saying "I'll be fine, I always have extra dv" in the VAB.

Floor 4942: 24 Kerbals, the 24th comes into the room and suggests that the Kerbal in the capsule, blows the hatch, jumps out and uses their personal parachute to float down.

Edited May 22 by ColdJ
